DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective evaluate effect selective laser trabeculoplasty ( SLT ) diurnal intraocular pressure variation open-angle glaucoma patient ( OAG ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective observational study OAG patient undergo selective laser trabeculoplasty University Kentucky Chandler Medical Center . The patient recruit 12 month . Study include 3 visit : pre-laser visit , visit laser treatment post-laser visit . All visit occur within 3-month period .
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnosis open angle glaucoma Subjects able speak understand English provide meaningful write informed consent , Subjects willing able comply test requirement define protocol willing able comply require study visit . Subjects previous laser treatment intraocular surgery , Subjects history ocular inflammation history previous ocular trauma .
